properties.description: We are a friendly open living room. Mondays we open as a self serve warm space. Tuesdays we serve tea / coffee and cakes and enjoy a free relaxed bingo session. Wednesday mornings is when we host the Foodbank (tea and coffee available) and Thursday is a free community cafe offering hot food, cakes and drinks. We also have housing, benefits and debt advice available on site during the Thursday session.

hours._text: Holistic Health Hub Derbyshire Cemetery Chapel Staveley Cemetery Inkersall Road Chesterfield S43 3JL Warm and welcoming space for residents from Chesterfield and surrounding communities. Opportunities to socialise and join in with free wellbeing activities and have a warm drink and cake and biscuits. Activities include various yoga options, children’s circus skills, crafting. Lego nights and community events. Everyone will be made very welcome. Mon-Fri 9.30am - 7pm Sat 9am - 11pm Sun 11am - 1pm Last Sun of each month 11am-5pm (free class options too)

Richard Coles 07814 557379 Hollingwood Community Room 'Open House' Laburnam Street, Chesterfield, S40 4ST Free hot drinks, biscuits, soup and roll. Safe and friendly environment where people can come and see a friendly face and have a chat. Mondays 11am-3pm

Inspiring Inkersall Community Group The Hollies, Inkersall, Chesterfield S43 3SP Via Facebook or just go along. Free drinks and meals for adults and children after school. Access to a laptop for people coming to our space and free Wi-Fi access. Board games and colouring for children. Thursdays 11.30am-4.30pm

Inkersall Methodist Church (portacabin) Summerskill Green Inkersall Chesterfield S43 3SR 	Jean Metcalfe 01246 476997 Minister Rev Tracey Harris tracey.harris@methodist.org.uk No charge	Tuesdays 10am-12pm
